title: Love the Lord
author: Mona Bagasao Crane
chorded_song:
G                                    Em
Love the Lord Your God with all your heart
                                C
And all your soul and all your mind
                D
and love all mankind,as you would love yourself, and


G                     Em                   C
L-o-v-e the Lord your G-o-d with all your heart
              D
and all your soul and mind and love all mankind.


G                            Em
We've got Christian lives to live
                          C
We've got Jesus' Love to give
                     D
We've got nothing to hide because in Him we abide.
G
Love.
unchorded_song:
Love the Lord Your God with all your heart
And all your soul and all your mind
and love all mankind, as you would love yourself, and
Love the Lord your God with all your heart
and all your soul and mind and love all mankind.
We've got Christian lives to live, We've got Jesus' love to give
We've got nothing to hide because in Him we abide.
Love.

title: As the Deer
author: Martin J. Nystrom
chorded_song:
C        G          Am       C/E           F          G      C   G
As the deer panteth for the water, so my soul longeth after You;
 C    G           Am                    F        G      C     
You alone are my heart's desire, and I long to worship You.

         Am                  F           C
Chorus: You alone are my strength, my shield,
            F                Dm      E
        To You alone may my spirit yield.
         C    G           Am    
        You alone are my heart's desire,
                F       G      C
        And I long to worship You.

You're my friend and you are my brother even though You are a King.
I love You more than any other, so much more than anything.
unchorded_song:
As the deer panteth for the water,
So my soul longeth after You;
You alone are my heart's desire,
And I long to worship You.

Chorus: You alone are my strength, my shield,
        To You alone may my spirit yield.
        You alone are my heart's desire,
        And I long to worship You.

You're my friend and you are my brother
Even though You are a King.
I love You more than any other,
So much more than anything.

title: My Desire
author: Wilfred Bout
chorded_song:
Dm - Bb     F - C 
You are my Lord,
               Bb                F
And I want to love the way You loved,
            Bb                C  
I want to serve the way You served,
      Dm - Bb        F - C              Bb            F 
Even  though  it may  cost  all that I have and all I am,
           Bb              C           Dm - Bb - F - C 
All of my life to be like You is my desire.


Dm         Bb          F          C
Beautiful Saviour, the King of my life, 
            Bb  F      Bb  C   
And I will love You, serve You.
Dm           Bb       F        C                  Bb   F 
Awesome and holy God, it's my desire that I will love You,
Bb     C  Dm - Bb - F - C 
Serve You more.
         F         C                  F
(Ending: It's my desire to serve you more)
unchorded_song:
You are my Lord,
And I want to love the way You loved,
I want to serve the way You served,
Even though it may cost all that I have and all I am,
All of my life to be like You is my desire.

Beautiful Saviour, the King of my life, 
And I will love You, serve You.
Awesome and holy God, it's my desire that I will love You,
Serve You more.

(Ending: It's my desire to serve You more)
